mapper.insert: INSERT INTO THURXE_CHTMLM ( HTML_FL_PTH, HTML_FL_NM, DEL_YN, GUID, GUID_PRG_SNO, LST_CHG_USID, LST_CHG_DTM, GNT_DTM ) VALUES ( #{html}, #{htmlName}, #{deleteYn}, #{guid}, #{guidPrgSno}, #{lstChgUsid}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE THURXE_CHTMLM SET HTML_FL_NM = #{htmlName}, DEL_YN = #{deleteYn}, GUID = #{guid}, GUID_PRG_SNO = #{guidPrgSno}, LST_CHG_USID = #{lstChgUsid}, LST_CHG_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE HTML_FL_PTH = #{html}
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO THURXE_CHTMLM target USING ( SELECT #{html} AS HTML_FL_PTH, #{htmlName} AS HTML_FL_NM, #{deleteYn} AS DEL_YN, #{guid} AS GUID, #{guidPrgSno} AS GUID_PRG_SNO, #{lstChgUsid} AS LST_CHG_USID FROM dual ) source ON (target.GUID = source.GUID) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET target.HTML_FL_NM = source.HTML_FL_NM, target.DEL_YN = source.DEL_YN, target.GUID_PRG_SNO = source.GUID_PRG_SNO, target.LST_CHG_USID = source.LST_CHG_USID, target.LST_CHG_DTM = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( HTML_FL_PTH, HTML_FL_NM, DEL_YN, GUID, GUID_PRG_SNO, LST_CHG_USID, LST_CHG_DTM, GNT_DTM ) VALUES ( source.HTML_FL_PTH, source.HTML_FL_NM, source.DEL_YN, source.GUID, source.GUID_PRG_SNO, source.LST_CHG_USID, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
